conversations.body_text: ID 为 9124 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单9124  
      主题: Order  
      描述:  Hey I ordered a set of pedals but never received a confirmation email or a tracking number

Hi Ramon Luna,    We apologize for the delayed response. Your order has already been shipped. Please contact FedEx as soon as possible to make any necessary changes.  We will also have our US warehouse staff attempt to contact FedEx.  887390632610
